metadata.title: Xtratuf 2850010 Bama Sokket Blue 10 Mens
features: Acrylic fiber and cotton tricot blend wicks away perspiration
Adds an extra layer of warmth and insulation to your boots
Boot liners are removable for all-season comfort
Wear one size smaller than your boot size for the best fit
description: Xtratuf Women's Bama Socks - Xtratuf Bama Sokket removable, insulating boot liners combine acrylic fiber with cotton tricot to wick away perspiration and insulate against the cold. Wear one size larger boot when wearing Bama Sokkets. Removable
